name: Potions for emotions
description: @karen_medinaart  Potions for emotions is a work created from the challenge that is made in the month of October having a list to follow throughout the month, one word per day, however although it carries a theme always goes in continuity to the themes that I handle as an artist which is about the body and emotions as well as madness and imagination. These are potions for each emotion that we need to release to move forward, opening our eyes to move forward and not remain engrossed in the situation we are living.
